document.docAuthor: Cianferoni, Fabio, Saleem, Rukhshanda, Afsheen, Sumera & Zia, Ahmed
document.masterDocTitle: The water striders of Pakistan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae): new records from Punjab and first checklist for the country

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The water striders of Pakistan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae): new records from Punjab and first checklist for the country

mods:name.mods:affiliation: National Research Council of Italy, Research Institute on Terrestrial Ecosystems (CNR-IRET), Via Madonna del Piano 10, I- 50019 Sesto Fiorentino (Florence), Italy. & University of Florence, Natural History Museum, “ La Specola ”, Zoology, Via Romana 17, I- 50125 Florence, Italy.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gerris argentata Spinola 1837: 65
(preoccupied by
Gerris argentatus Schummel, 1832
).

Gerris spinolae Lethierry & Severin 1896: 63
(new name for
Gerris argentata Spinola, 1837
). Syn.
Lundblad (1933: 372)
.—
Pakistan :
Pruthi (1933: 102
. Punjab Province , Jhelum District, Chalisa).

Aquarius adelaidis : Andersen 1990: 61
.—
Pakistan :
Buzzetti et al. (2006: 40
. Sindh Province , Thatta District, Keenjhar Lake).
